title: Was part of the twin tower scene in "the house alone " cut off for television?
subtitle: The high sky scene in "Hum Alone 2: Lost in New York" was dazzled by a 2020 television broadcast.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: Part of a scene in "Hum Alone 2: Missing in New York," which photographed the twin towers of the World Trade Center, was missing from the December 2020 film broadcast on Freeform.
